You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X X X X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X X X X X
DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with a symmetrical pattern of X's and ▢'s, where the ▢'s are placed in the middle three rows and are evenly spaced, and the X's are placed on the top and bottom rows.
